column2: I got a text saying our table was ready. We went in and were to be seated at a communal diner style table. Since we were visiting our niece and wanted a real table for some conversation
column3: we declined that seating. The hostess graciously put us back on the list and said we should not have gone on the "any available seating" list. You can sit at a table
column5: a diner counter or the diner tables. Now we know. We went back outside for 15 minutes and the hostess came out to find us.
